summary: Automated test suite that validates DreamBooth LoRA fine‑tuning workflows, checking basic training execution, checkpoint limit enforcement and cleanup, custom caption handling, and compatibility with both the core diffusion model and an optional text encoder for standard and SDXL architectures.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of DreamBooth LoRA training pipelines, ensuring proper checkpoint management and seamless integration with text encoders, thereby supporting robust model customization for end‑users.
